trans-unit.source: Represents an embedded external resource in an email attachment, such as an image in an HTML attachment.
trans-unit.target: 表示電子郵件附件，例如 HTML 附件中的映像中的內嵌外部資源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> using the supplied <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>使用提供的<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含此內嵌資源的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: contentStream is .
trans-unit.target: contentStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> using the specified file name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>使用指定的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file name holding the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 保存這個內嵌資源的內容檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: fileName is .
trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> with the values supplied by <xref:System.IO.Stream> and <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>所提供的值與<xref:System.IO.Stream>和<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含此內嵌資源的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容型別。

trans-unit.source: contentStream is .
trans-unit.target: contentStreamis .

trans-unit.source: contentType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: contentType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and media type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>具有指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>和媒體類型。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含此內嵌資源的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: MIME 媒體類型的內容。

trans-unit.source: contentStream is .
trans-unit.target: contentStreamis .

trans-unit.source: mediaType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: mediaType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> with the specified file name and content type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>與指定的檔案名稱和內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The file name that holds the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含此內嵌資源的內容檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容型別。

trans-unit.source: fileName is .
trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.source: contentType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: contentType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> with the specified file name and media type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>與指定的檔案名稱和媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: The file name that holds the content for this embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含此內嵌資源的內容檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: MIME 媒體類型的內容。

trans-unit.source: fileName is .
trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.source: mediaType is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: mediaType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URI that the resource must match.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定必須符合資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: If ContentLink is a relative URI, the recipient of the message must resolve it.
trans-unit.target: ContentLink 是相對 URI，如果訊息的收件者必須解決它。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object from a string to be included in an email attachment as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>從字串到包含在電子郵件附件做為內嵌資源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default media type is plain text, and the default content type is ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 預設媒體類型為純文字，並預設內容類型為 ASCII。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"> </xref>物件，其中包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: The specified content string is null.
trans-unit.target: 指定內容的字串為 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object from a string to be included in an email attachment as an embedded resource, with the specified content type, and media type as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>從要包含在電子郵件附件做為內嵌的資源，使用指定的內容類型和媒體類型為純文字字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容型別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"> </xref>物件，其中包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: The specified content string is null.
trans-unit.target: 指定內容的字串為 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object from a string to be included in an email attachment as an embedded resource, with the specified content type, and media type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>從字串到包含在電子郵件附件做為內嵌的資源，使用指定的內容類型和媒體類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容型別。

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: MIME 媒體類型的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> object that contains the embedded resource to be included in the email attachment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"> </xref>物件，其中包含要包含在電子郵件附件中內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: The specified content string is null.
trans-unit.target: 指定內容的字串為 null。
